price: If We willed, We could reduce your harvest to rubble, leaving you to wonder and lament,
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
